description: Lists all of the topics within an account.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that contains the topics that you want to list.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the topic.

nested_items.name: TopicId
nested_items.description: The ID for the topic. This ID is unique per Amazon Web Services Region for each Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: UserExperienceVersion
nested_items.description: The user experience version of the topic.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no more results.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
